parameters.input_text:
=Hi {{ $json.name.split(' ')[0] }},

I'm Siddharth Vora, Fund Manager at PL Capital.

I noticed your impressive role as {{ $json.title }} at {{ $json.company }}, and wanted to reach out personally.

Many {{ $json.title }}s I work with face the challenge of portfolio underperformance. Our AQUA strategy delivered 76% returns in Year 1 through systematic, quantitative investing.

I'd love to show you how our data-driven approach could enhance your portfolio returns.

Can we schedule a brief call this week?

Best regards,
Siddharth Vora
parameters.title: =Personalized Outreach - {{ $json.name }}

parameters.subject: ={{ $json.name.split(' ')[0] }} - A Personal Message from Siddharth Vora
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $json.name.split(' ')[0] }},

[Watch Video: {{ $node["Generate HeyGen Video"].json.video_url }}]

Siddharth Vora
Fund Manager, PL Capital
